HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: It's so easy! This is how it works:
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cundinamarca has for you to explore a lot of experiences and wonderful destinations
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_2: De Tour por Cundinamarca helps you search places according to your interests so you get the opportunity to explore the region
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_3: Enjoy all the adventures waiting for you!

HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.PAGE_TITLE: This is how De Tour por Cundinamarca works:

HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_2: Show your products and services on the Internet
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_3: Make your business visible to 48% of the national tourism
